{"id":946694903,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1683559058,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/946694903/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"19.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int left = 0;\n        int right = height.size()-1;\n        int res = 0;\n        int lmax = 0, rmax = 0;\n\n        while (left <= right) {\n            if (height[left] < height[right]) {\n                if (height[left] > lmax) {\n                    lmax = height[left];\n                } else {\n                    res += lmax - height[left];\n                }\n                left++;\n            } else {\n                if (height[right] > rmax) {\n                    rmax = height[right];\n                } else {\n                    res += rmax - height[right];\n                }\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false}
